data.name: Sound FX: Bullet Impacts
data.detailed_description: Prepare for impact! This EFX Bullet Impact collection features a huge number of impacts into cars, metal, walls, water, body impacts, as well as passbys, ricochets and underwater passbys. A must-have for for actual bullet and combat sounds – and for adding oomph to many other types of impact sounds too! Includes 320 sounds that are the perfect companion for SONAR Steam Edition or any compatible digital audio workstation with support for Wave files.
data.about_the_game: Prepare for impact! data.short_description: Prepare for impact! This EFX Bullet Impact collection features a huge number of impacts into cars, metal, walls, water, body impacts, as well as passbys, ricochets and underwater passbys. A must-have for for actual bullet and combat sounds – and for adding oomph to many other types of impact sounds too!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win 7, Win 8, Win 8.1 or Win 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or newer
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280x800 (1920 x 1080 recommended)
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: ASIO compatible hardware is recommended
  • Additional Notes: Connection required for downloads

data.legal_notice:
*Cakewalk Loop Manager is designed and tested to be compatible with STEAM installations of Music Creator and SONAR. Other SONAR or Music Creator configurations/installations are not officially supported.
**Cakewalk Loop Manager should be installed to the same STEAM Library that you have Music Creator and/or SONAR installed to for proper operation.
***Cakewalk Loop Manager does not need Music Creator or SONAR installed to be utilized.
